text: The Last Story ( in Japan) is a action role-playing video game, developed by Mistwalker and AQ Interactive for the Wii video game console, that published Worldwide by Nintendo and Xseed games in the North American version. Originally released in Japan in 2011, and Worldwide one year later. title: The Last Story
